com.rohitsood.urlybird.gui.manager
Interface GuiManager

All Superinterfaces:
Mode
All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiManagerImpl
public interface GuiManager
extends Mode

Mediator for all UI components in the system. All components are registered with the manager, when events are fired, the call is delegated to the manager. The manager decouples individual widgets and centralizes all controls and changes to the UI. The manager is also responsible for selecting the mode of the client. This can be switched dynamically.

Version:
1.8
Author:
Rohit Sood

Method Detail

setMode

public void setMode(int mode)
Sets the mode of the gui manager. Appropriate clients are instatiated and used based on the mode.

Parameters:
mode - The mode to run the GuiManager in.
